bio: I'm a red dragon that likes taking photos
contributionDescription:
I have written numerous interviews about NFT artists to spread the word about their work. 
The interviews go into detail about the artist and their work in their respective medium.
It explains the stories of how the artist developed their style, what were their influences usw.
impactDescription:
I've attracted more people to use Mirror and in turn the OPTIMISM network. 
By getting people to appreciate the possibility of blogging on the blockchain is a big win for the ecosystem. It is a web3app that is perfect for people that like to write and share their musings with the opportunity of purchasing them as an NFT.
